description:
Remove the bw graph command entirely (cmd/bw/graph.go, graph_test.go). Its functionality is replaced by the BLOCKED BY / BLOCKS sections in show.

Remove from command registry in command.go. Remove the 'Dependencies' command group or rename it if 'dep' still lives there alone.

Also remove Store.Graph() and GraphNode type from internal/issue/issue.go â€” the shared primitives (loadEdges, walkTips) replace them. Update any callers of Graph() if they exist outside the graph command.
title: Remove bw graph command
